verses.content: Aw Pathien Iengdinga kumkhuoa i mi thlauthlâk am a na? Iengdinga i ran tlatna hmuna berâmhai chunga hin i lungsen a khûk am a na?
I mihai inkhâwmhai, inhmaha i închâwk, Hnam i ro dinga i întlan kha, hre zing rawh; I umna hlak Zion tlâng leh.
Kumkhaw rêmna tieng chun i ke khai la, Dotuhaiin hmun inthienga chun thil suol tinrêng an thaw ta hi.
Nangma dotuhai chu i mihai inkhâwmhai laia chun an hawhaw dur dur a, An inchiknahai chu inchikna dingin an khai tah a.
Mi, rampui thing, Hreipuia tinhai angin an inlang a.
Tuhin chu a thil kermawihai po po chu, Hreite le tubauhaiin an suksiet zo tah a.
I hmun inthieng chu an rawh a, I hming umna khawm chu leihnuoi ichîm khawp hielin an sukkhawhlo tah a.
An lungrila chun, “Sukse vawng tâwl ei tiu,” an tih a, Hi rama Pathien inkhâwmna in po po hi an raw siet zo tah.
Kan inchiknahai chu kan hmu ta nawh a, Zâwlnei hrim hrim an um ta nawh a, A sâwt dingzie hre hrim hrim khawm keini lai an um nawh.
Aw Pathien, dotu chun ieng chen am a hrilsiet ding che? Hmêlma chun kumkhuoin i hming hi a hrilsiet ding am a nih?
Iengdinga i kut, i kut changtieng kha i lâk kîr am a na? Kei dawk nâwk la, anni chu sukbohmang rawh.
Nisienlakhawm, Pathien chu inhma chena ka Lal a nih, Hnuoi laitaka sandamna siemhlaktu chu.
Nang chun i hrâtnain tuisuoriet kha i sukṭheh a, Nang chun tuia drakonhai luhai chu i sukkawi a.
Nang chun Leviathan luhai chu i suknâwi a, Ama chu thlalêra umhai kuoma chun bu dingin i pêk a,
Nang chun tuihnâr le tuilien chu în ṭhe huk a, Nang chun vadung lientak takhai chu i sukkang a.
Sûn hi i ta a na, zân khawm i ta a nih; Nangin êntu le nisa khi i buotsai a.
Nangin leihnuoi ramrihai po po chu i khang vawng a, Nangin nipui le thlasik hi i siem a.
Aw LALPA, hi hi hre zing rawh, dotu chun a hrilsiet cheh a. Hnam invêttak chun i hming an hrilsiet kha.
Aw, i vaṭhu hringna hi ram sahrâng kuoma chun pe lul naw la, I mi rimsihai hringna hi kumkhuo chun theinghil lul naw rawh.
Thuthlung kha hung pawisa la, Hnuoi hmun inthim lai chu nunsietnain a sip sih a.
Aw, nêksâwrna tuortuhai chu muolphoin kîr naw sienla, Rimsi le pasiehai chun i hming inpâk raw se.
Aw Pathien, tho la, nangma thu chu nangin inhril fâwm la, Mi invêt chun sûnnithlâkin a hrilsietzie che chu hre zing rawh.
Nangma dotuhai ri chu theinghil naw la, Nangma dotuhai ri so insâng zuol pei chu.
